thread.title: Grand family vacation - Gujarat / Rajasthan - Nov' 2015
thread.title_full: Grand family vacation - Gujarat / Rajasthan - Nov' 2015

author: abhibham
title: Grand family vacation - Gujarat / Rajasthan - Nov' 2015
text: 1 Grand Family Road trip for round 10  12 days & wish to cover possible essence of Gujarat/Rajasthan (nothing specific). Am calling it grand as my 2 way families are being clubbed together i.e. Maternal & Paternal. 5 cars fully occupied. Being once in a time opportunity to get so many people together, wish to make it memorable for all. Since it is a pooled family vacation we have members of all age group youngest being 5 years & Oldest 58 years. By Gods grace none with any major health issues. located in DAMAN we will start from there. My personal wish is to include Abu Ambaji, Mt. Abu & Rann of Kutch , if possible in an itinerary. & washrooms), food  Dhabas would do.
